Your local expert:

Bio:

Ali is a journalist, Traveller and Holistic Health coach based in Bali. She is also the Founder of @Girlspo+ empowering girls around the world.

Course Details:

Location: Bali, Indonesia

Duration: 1 day

Level: Beginner

Price: $100 USD

What you'll learn:

Learn how to write and create unique content in Bali from a professional journalist.

Where we'll be:

Ubud, Bali

What I'll provide:

I will teach you how to structure your writing, how to pick relevant topics and how to keep it structured and unique. Whether you're starting a blog or writing marketing content, I can help you dive into the writing journey and become a better writer.

Good to know

This is a 1 day course and after this course you will have lerned the basics of writing, how to structure content, topics, create compelling headlines and how to turn it into unique content.

Where we'll meet:

Ubud, Bali
